title: Bloody Tear
summaries: The Bloody Tear is a consumable item used to summon a Blood Moon. It can only be used at night, and attempting to use it during the day or during a Blood Moon will not summon a Blood Moon/affect the ongoing Blood Moon, nor consume the item.

The Bloody Tear can only be dropped during a Blood Moon by non statue-spawned enemies (i.e. enemies killed after the Blood Moon has ended do not drop it), with a 1*1/100 (1%) chance from common Blood Moon enemies, a 4*1/25 (4%) chance by the Wandering Eye Fish, Zombie Merman, Blood Eel, and Hemogoblin Shark, a 10*1/10 (10%) chance by the clown, a 20*1/5 (20%) chance by The Groom and The Bride.
Additionally, the Dreadnautilus can drop it at any time with a 50*1/2 (50%) / 100*1/1 (100%) chance.
